Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham’s last-second goal rescued a draw for England after two defensive blunders had given Belgium the advantage.
Jude Bellingham commented on the performance, highlighting the difficulty of playing under pressure and the importance of the draw after a previous defeat.
Gareth Southgate defended his decision to pick John Stones despite his injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England players wore shirts without names on the back in the second half to raise awareness of dementia.
Kobbie Mainoo made a serious case to be included in Gareth Southgate’s squad for the European Championship with his performance.
